annotations.description: According to the statistics, the match was pretty entertaining. There were plenty of thrilling moments. It was a very tight match, with not much between the two teams. Both sides adopted slow build up play tactics today.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows for the end of today's match.

John Obi Mikel (Chelsea) receives a quality pass and releases a rocket of a shot from distance, but his amazing effort goes just wide of the right post. The goalkeeper probably wouldn't have saved this one.

Troy Deeney (Watford) is first to the rebound but his shot is blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition.

Eden Hazard (Chelsea) finds his teammate inside the box with a sweet pass. However, Diego Costa wasn't able to finish and lost the ball.

Willian (Chelsea) sends in a pass which fails to reach any of his teammates.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: We are about to witness a subsitution. Valon Behrami (Watford) for Almen Abdi.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Diego Costa (Chelsea) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Fantastic team goal! Diego Costa (Chelsea) was set free in the area by Willian and he made no mistake with a lovely finish into the bottom left corner. 2:2.
Willian (Chelsea) sends a cross into the box, but Heurelho Gomes comes off his line to gather the ball.

Pedro (Chelsea) received a pass inside the box and sent a dangerous shot in on goal, but keep the champagne on ice as one of the defenders stepped in and blocked the effort. It's hard to say whether the keeper would have stopped it.
Oscar (Chelsea) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence quickly intercepts the ball. The referee and the linesman both signal a throw in for Chelsea.
Pedro (Chelsea) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.

annotations.label: soccer-ball-own

Some patient build up play from Watford as they look to unlock the defence.

The game produced by the players until now hasn't been particularly attractive, but there is still 45 minutes left so let's hope they will come out with renewed vigour and provide better entertainment this half. It has been a tight contest so far. Both teams are attempting to play possession football.
